BUTTONS.UPLOADAREA: Drop video file, or click here

PREVIEW.STILLREAD: Please wait, still reading the file

GREETING.0: This web application will help you cut a fragment from a small video file directly in your browser. It does not require installation.
GREETING.1: Your files are not sent to the server, processed only by your computer in your browser and are available only to you.
GREETING.2: The application interface is very simple. You can easily master it, read the file from the disk and get a link to the finished video.
GREETING.3: Processing speed depends on the size and resolution of the video, as well as the power of your computer and browser.
GREETING.4: The web application works with a large number of video formats. If the file does not open, it is probably damaged or too large.
GREETING.5: We are constantly improving our application and expanding the set of functions. You do not need to download or update anything.
GREETING.6: How it works? This is a javascript application, it can work directly in the browser. Your files are always safe!
GREETING.7: This is a free web-app. You do not have to pay anything, just upload your files and use.
